lead_paragraph: As rates for major crimes continue to fall in the city, statistics on lesser crimes remain largely unreported.
snippet: As rates for major crimes continue to fall in the city, statistics on lesser crimes remain largely unreported.

headline.print_headline: City Keeping Minor Crimes Under Radar
headline.main: Data Elusive on Low-Level Crime in New York City
headline.seo: In N.Y.C. Crime Statistics, Missing Data on Minor Ones
headline.sub: Officials With New York’s Police Dept. Blame Computer Problems;

byline.original: By RAY RIVERA and AL BAKER
